dialogue: After driving around for hours in the dark looking for this damned camouflaged mailbox-
-we walked in the door, and        the table had just been         It was well after ten o'clock- cleared for dessert!
-and then what?!
I noticed something a little funny about the other dinner guests.
How so?!
They just all looked a bit pale in the face, I reckon...
Stop it! I can't breathe.
Daddy kept apologizing to our hostess-
Was it awful?
I kid you not; cow tallow and fruit pie!
-and poor daddy has such a sweet tooth! I didn't know how to warn him in front of everyone before he took a bite this big!
Mrs. Toth! How lovely to see you! Do you need a hand?
I'm all right, thank you.
Is Mr. Toth here, as well?
Just me, I'm afraid.
To what do we owe the pleasure?
Is your father in?
We were just sitting down to dinner.
No trouble at all. I'm happy to wait until you're all finished.
Don't be silly! I'll have the kitchen fix you a plate.
You're kind, Maggie, thank you.
Right this way.
Please sit.
Don't push her, Harry!
Look at him. He cannot say anything.
Daddy, has something happened between you and Mrs. Toth?
It wasn't me-
